ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: From a drop of sperm He created him and proportioned h
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: From a single sperm He created, then proportioned him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Out of a sperm-drop did He create him and then determined a measure for him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He created him from a living germ. He determined his fate
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: From a drop of liquid; He created him and then set several measures for him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: From a Nutfah He created him and then set him in due proportion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Of a small seed; He created him, then He made him according to a measure,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Of a sperm-drop He created him, and determined him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: From a drop of seed. He createth him and proportioneth him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Out of a drop of sperm! He creates and proportions him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Of a drop of seed. He created him and formed him according to a measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He created him from a drop of [seminal] fluid; then proportioned him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: From a sperm-drop: He hath created him, and then mouldeth him in due proportions;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: From Nutfah (male and female semen drops) He created him, and then set him in due proportion;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: From a (sperm) drop He created him and then determined him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: From a sperm drop He created him, and enabled him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [80:19] From a drop of sperm did He create him then proportion him, [in stages] as a blood-clot, then an embryo up to the last [stage] of his creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then explained and said to him: (From a drop of seed. He createth him) a living being (and proportioneth him) He proportioned his creation by giving him two hands, two feet, two eyes, two ears as well as all the other organs,
